record.author: Andrew Gray
record.notes: Sowa language is extinct; the last fluent speaker died in 2000.
record.classification: Austronesian, Malayo-Polynesian, Central-Eastern Malayo-Polynesian, Eastern Malayo-Polynesian, Oceanic, Central-Eastern Oceanic, Remote Oceanic, North and Central Vanuatu, Northeast Vanuatu-Banks Islands, East Vanuatu

record.annotation: usually in combination with other verbs (dal pwere, 'cut and split')
